A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am a pretty big star wars fan\, have been for a long time. I did not like this movie though. For the same reasons other have mentioned. I expected greater plot depth and character development\, Luke to do more with a light saber\, and no people flying in space without spaceships. For a Star Wars fan\, this is like your favorite sports team having a bad season. I hope the next one is better.
